TopicTitle: ASSET PROPS -- PFD Missing Texture on Attitude Indicator

Articles.Content:
Just as it says on the tin... there is no background image on the Attitude indicator on any of the mods that make use of this wonderful mod. i have tried a completely fresh install with only the requisite mods, and still just a black background on the navball. i see that the dds file is present in the install.

Anyone got any ideas?

You may have installed it wrong. If you drag too low, or high of a folder in the hierarchy it may have issues loading certain parts. I'd look at the install instructions to be sure of what folder to drag in.
